text: Kemal Monteno (17 September 1948 â€“ 21 January 2015) was a Bosnian singer- songwriter. His career stretched back to the 1960s. He recorded his first song "Lidija" in 1967 and has enjoyed a prosperous career in the former Yugoslavia. He is perhaps best known for "Sarajevo ljubavi moja", a tribute to his home town. Monteno died at a Zagreb hospital of pneumonia and sepsis on 21 January 2015 due to complications after the kidney transplant. He was 66 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1948 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from sepsis Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina writers Category:Singer-songwriters Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina entertainers
title: Kemal Monteno
